plot: Randall has to deal with the aftermath of the intruder, who broke into the house when Beth and the girls were asleep upstairs and who Randall stumbled upon as he made his late night rounds around the house. This item, in addition to keeping the news about Rebecca without the support from his siblings, and having to deal with work, he soon to hold a town hall meeting to defend his support of a controversial housing bill which many in his district fear will raise their rents, will lead to him having to keep his anxiety in check, some who can see through what he is going. One of those people, only knowing him casually, may actually have a better understanding of the holistic issue Randall is facing. Some key moments in Randall's life when the anxiety manifested itself, including as far back as his childhood, are presented. Meanwhile, Kevin is back in Pittsburgh making an old connection in someone's time of need.—Huggo
